item.title: Building a GitHub Page with theme using Hugo (Windows)
item.description: This is my first personal blog built with Hugo, and it took me a really long time to read the official guideline and work through every single details. Preparation Since my computer’s system is Windows 10, which makes it less convenient to finish this job, I need to do the following preparations before all steps. Install Chocolatey to install Hugo Install Hugo with Chocolatey Install Typora (Markdown editor)
